result.eng: Let's say you have a million euro to spend.
result.ga: Abair go bhfuil milliún euro le caitheamh agat
result.orig: Abair go bhfuil milliún euro le caitheamh agat
result.html: Abair go bhfuil milliún euro le caitheamh agatLet's say you have a million euro to spend.
result.ponchtml: Abair go ḃfuil milliún euro le caiṫeaṁ agatLet's say you have a million euro to spend.

result.html: Caitheann muid €900 ar an chíosWe spend €900 on the rent.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫeann muid €900 ar an ċíosWe spend €900 on the rent.

result.eng: You spend too much money on drink.
result.ga: Caitheann tú an iomarca airgid ar an deoch
result.orig: Caitheann tú an iomarca airgid ar an deoch
result.html: Caitheann tú an iomarca airgid ar an deochYou spend too much money on drink.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫeann tú an iomarca airgid ar an deoċYou spend too much money on drink.

result.eng: Did you spend two weeks there?
result.html: Ar chaith tú coicís annDid you spend two weeks there?
result.ponchtml: Ar ċaiṫ tú coicís annDid you spend two weeks there?

result.eng: It was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.
result.ga: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féin
result.orig: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féin
result.html: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féinIt was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé fíorḋeas cúpla seaċtain a ċaiṫeaṁ anseo aċ beiḋ mé sásta a ḃeiṫ ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féinIt was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.

result.eng: Does she spend much time in Belfast now?
result.ga: An mbíonn sé i mBéal Feirste mórán anois
result.orig: An mbíonn sé i mBéal Feirste mórán anois
result.html: An mbíonn sé i mBéal Feirste mórán anoisDoes she spend much time in Belfast now?
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn sé i mBéal Feirste mórán anoisDoes she spend much time in Belfast now?

result.eng: How did you spend the day, child?
result.ga: Goidé mar a chuir tú isteach an lá a leanbh
result.orig: Goidé mar a chuir tú isteach an lá a leanbh
result.html: Goidé mar a chuir tú isteach an lá a leanbhHow did you spend the day, child?
result.ponchtml: Goidé mar a ċuir tú isteaċ an lá a leanḃHow did you spend the day, child?

result.eng: If only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ga: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.orig: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.html: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ponchtml: Mo ċreaċ agus mo ċrá gan mé ċoṁ hóg leatsa inniu Ċaiṫfinn saol nár ċaiṫ méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
